main.title: the valley
main.body: the mountains end unnaturally, forming a perfectly square valley. a deep purple glow covers the valley; a small cube in the center is the only variation.

the-box.title: the message
the-box.body: a single message is engraved on the surface.go south of here until you reach a pond in a forest clearing. when you reach with the shore, dig to uncover the facility.
